ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | iccshftri.1 | |- A e. RR |
| 2 |  | iccshftri.2 | |- B e. RR |
| 3 |  | iccshftri.3 | |- R e. RR |
| 4 |  | iccshftri.4 | |- ( A + R ) = C |
| 5 |  | iccshftri.5 | |- ( B + R ) = D |
| 6 |  | #P_iccssre | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR ) -> ( A [,] B ) C_ RR ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 6 | #P_mp2an | |- ( A [,] B ) C_ RR |
| 8 | 7 | #P_sseli | |- ( X e. ( A [,] B ) -> X e. RR ) |
| 9 | 4, 5 | #P_iccshftr | |- ( ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR ) /\ ( X e. RR /\ R e. RR ) ) -> ( X e. ( A [,] B ) <-> ( X + R ) e. ( C [,] D ) ) ) |
| 10 | 1, 2, 9 | #P_mpanl12 | |- ( ( X e. RR /\ R e. RR ) -> ( X e. ( A [,] B ) <-> ( X + R ) e. ( C [,] D ) ) ) |
| 11 | 3, 10 | #P_mpan2 | |- ( X e. RR -> ( X e. ( A [,] B ) <-> ( X + R ) e. ( C [,] D ) ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_biimpd | |- ( X e. RR -> ( X e. ( A [,] B ) -> ( X + R ) e. ( C [,] D ) ) ) |
| 13 | 8, 12 | #P_mpcom | |- ( X e. ( A [,] B ) -> ( X + R ) e. ( C [,] D ) ) |
